headline: Kenvue Valuation In Focus As Kimberly-Clark Deal Gains Approval
summary: Kimberly-Clark shareholders have approved the acquisition of Kenvue (NYSE:KVUE). Kenvue shareholders have also voted in favor, allowing the transaction to move toward completion. The deal now progresses through remaining closing steps, including any required regulatory clearance. Kenvue, the consumer health company behind a range of over the counter products and personal care brands, is set to shift from a standalone public company into the Kimberly-Clark group if the transaction closes...
